mapper.update: update lt_ad_google_adwords_report_campaign_temp set markup_type = #{markupType}, markup_amount = #{markupAmount}, charge_amount = cost + #{markupAmount} * clicks, ad_campaign_id = #{adCampaignId} is_charged = 1 where date = #{date}
